conversations.conversation:
YOU CANT WIN EVERY GAME YOU PLAY:
;
;CHEER UP IF YOU HAVE LOST OR WON.
;
;ITS JUST YOUR PRIDE WHICH MAKES YOU FEEL
;
;YOU MUST BE ALWAYS NUMBER ONE.

IF I COULD ASK ONE GIFT FROM GOD
;ONE GIFT AND NOTHING MORE
;I"D CHOOSE THE PRICELESS GIFT OF LOVE
;TO TREASURE IN MY STORE.
;
;THEN I WOULD OWN THE PRECIOUS BALM
;TO CURE THE WORLD OF HATE
;I"D MAKE MY LITTLE WORLD A PLACE
;WHERE RICH AND POOR RELATE.
;
;FOR LOVE CAN RECONCILE BAD FOES
; AND MAKE US ONE AGAIN.
;SO OPEN WIDE YOUR WOUNDED HEART
;AND LET LOVE HEAL THE PAIN.
